long_description: The Polar H7 heart rate sensor transmits live heart rate data to smartphone mobile training apps, Polar devices and compatible gym equipment so you can make the most of every exercise session. Bluetooth(R) Smart wireless incorporates a coded 5 kHz transmission with a range of up to 10m. Soft textile chest strap comfortably fits your body shape and allows freedom of movement. The Polar H7 heart rate sensor features a user-replaceable battery. Bluetooth(R) Smart enabled devices include iPhone 4S and 5, iPod touch (5th generation) and Nano (7th generation) and iPad (3rd & 4th generation). Add the free, Android-compatible Polar Beat app to your smartphone to enjoy all the training benefits of the H7 heart rate sensor on an Android 4.3 or later platform.
